higgs-quartic-gut.label: (5.7) Higgs Quartic at GUT Scale
higgs-quartic-gut.description: Higgs quartic coupling at GUT scale from RG evolution

steps: In SUSY GUTs, Higgs quartic related to D-terms: λ = (g²+g'²)/4
At unification: g₁² = (5/3)g_GUT², g₂² = g_GUT²
Therefore: λ_0 = (1/4)[g_GUT² + (3/5)(5/3)g_GUT²] = g_GUT²/2
With α_GUT = g_GUT²/(4π): λ_0 = 2πα_GUT = 0.1289
